title: Resume

jobs.title: Senior Full-Stack Developer
jobs.description: Leading development of scalable web applications serving 100k+ users. Architected microservices infrastructure, reduced load times by 60%, and mentored junior developers. Tech stack: React, Node.js, PostgreSQL, AWS.

jobs.title: Full-Stack Developer
jobs.description: Built and shipped features for a SaaS platform from MVP to Series A. Implemented real-time collaboration features, RESTful APIs, and responsive frontend. Wore many hats, broke things, fixed things.

jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description: Created pixel-perfect responsive websites for various clients. Specialized in React, animation libraries, and making designers happy. Learned that "make it pop" is not useful feedback.

schools.description: Graduated with honors. Relevant coursework: Data Structures, Algorithms, Web Development, Database Systems, Software Engineering.
